flawed_nl_solution:
The cost will for 3 adults will be $12/adult x 3 adults = $<<12*3=36>>36
The cost for 3 children will be $10/child x 3 children = $<<10*3=30>>30
The total cost will be $36 + $30 = $<<36+30=61>>61
#### 61

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 66, not 61. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
